title: Fps issues/jittering/stutters!
body:
Hello, I've been having these issues for like 2 patches now I think?
Constant jitters/stutters in game, I've tried lots of things, like reinstalling whole windows, reinstalling league, removing all unecessary app, scanning system for viruses like 10 times, trying numerous fixes from boards etc, but it persists
Does anyone have any idea for any temporary fixes or anything? Would be very thankful!

replies.body: Similar to what Kokua is saying, I'm curious if you might be experiencing packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these impacted games and let me know what you find.   What steps have you tried so far when you mention numerous fixes?

If you have anything else connected to your internet that you're not using, you can disconnect them. For example, if you have a PS4 left on rest mode, or another PC that is left on when nobody is using it. Turning off the wifi on your phone or laptop.
